channel.title: Documentary on Technology
channel.description: I was wondering if anyone could help me out. I have to do a senior presentation on a social injustice. My injustice I choose is "Does the digital divide freeze citizens of less developed nations in poverty?" so I need to find a documentary to watch on this subject. Basically it just needs to be a documentary on technology in nations where technology is not readily available. I found one about the digital divide in Canada but seeing as there not really in poverty I am not sure as if I can use it. So anyone know of any documentaries about technology in Africa or another impoverished nation?

item.title: Documentary on Technology
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Hey thanks i was looking for something longer but I can definitely use that and reference it, maybe show a 20 second clip. rep++

Read full topic
